text: 15.22-24 Luk 15.32, Epe 2.1, 2.5, 5.14, Lep 3.1 Nap pen bɨ wog gɨñeb ne okok kɨlop agɨnɨgab, Ñɨ yad ak pɨsnep kul gɨl kumak tek lak ak pen, mɨñɨl koŋɨm mɨdeb nɨgebin agɨnɨgab agak. Nɨbi chech palawl yɨp ak am dad apɨl nop lɨñɨl, ñɨn mɨdup nop ak liŋ lɨñɨl, tob tɨlup ak lɨñɨl gɨnɨmɨb agɨnɨgab agak. Anɨgɨl am chag bulmakaw ñɨluk tep yɨbɨl olap pak dad apem, dagɨl ñɨbɨlɨg mɨñmɨñ gɨnɨgun agɨnɨgab agak. Agek, agɨnɨgab tek gɨl, tap mɨdup dagɨl ñɨbɨlɨg mɨñmɨñ gɨnɨgabal agak.
